nodes.text: Ethnic Architectural Forms of the Tion Hegemony

The Ethnic Architectural Forms of the Tion Hegemony was a publication written on the architectural trends of the Tionese cultures of the Tion Hegemony. It included a section on the planet Lianna, which covered the planet's tradition of using nature in its architecture. It also mentioned the floorpits that the Lianns used in most rooms.
